♥Matthew Settle/Rufus Humphrey #3 ~ Because he is rockin' around the christmas tree♥

Welcome to the 3rd Matthew Settle / Rufus Humphrey Appreciation Thread!

Please contact me or leave a message here if you want to be a member

Matthew Settle - Short facts

Date of Birth: 17 September 1969, Hickory, North Carolina

Full Name: Jeffrey Matthew Settle

Son of a Preacher Man (Pastor Robert E. Settle. Mother: Joan Settle)

Married since July 2006 with Naama Nativ, expecting first child (girl) in March 2009

Important movies/series: "Band of Brothers", "Into the West", "Gossip Girl", "Attraction", "The In Crowd", "I still know what you did last summer", "The Celestine Prophecy", "CSI Miami", ER, "Brothers & Sisters", "Rancid", "Im Reich der Reblaus", "Blue Smoke", "Beneath".

New movie: "Ex-Terminators" (2009)

27. Brilliant Disguise

28.

"Me and my wife - we are modest and very intelligent!"

"My wife laughed at my jokes. I'm secretly a clown, or maybe it's not much of a secret! I'm a little putzo as the Italians say, a little bit loopy. I can be bouncing off the walls at times, and she's right there to catch me."

"It's weird when people start calling me a DILF at all the wrong times. The producers are standing there and my wife is usually standing right beside me, but she's pretty cool about it."

"My special skill on my resume was actually spoon."

"He's cool because he's a rock star," Settle says. "He's a very human father. He shows care and respect. My dad is very much like this character.

He will speak his mind at any time, no matter if it is to the president or a stranger on the street. Rufus would do the same thing."

Lily: Don't try to be cute. Those days are long behind you.

Rufus: And here I was, thinking I get better looking every day.

Rufus: (answering the phone) This better not be my wife.

Lillian: Rufus! You always answer the phone like that?!

Rufus: Since when were you the patron saint of former rock stars?

Lily: Since when were you a rock star?

Rufus: I thought he should know how it feels to lose you. Cause, trust me, it's not fun.

Rufus: (on the phone) So, uh, Alison's leaving. She's spending some time alone with the kids. And I seem to have walked all the way from Brooklyn to your doorstep... without a jacket... in the snow. So, what the hell? I miss you. And I have been missing you for a while.

1) Son Of A Preacher Man - Dusty Springfield

YouTube - Dusty Springfield - Son of a preacher man

2) Candyman - Christina Aguilera

YouTube - Christina Aguilera - Candyman

3) Evening Of Roses - Erev Shel Shoshanim

YouTube - Erev Shel Shoshanim - Evening Of Roses

Reasons why we love Matthew

1) He is one of the best actors of this series.

2) His attraction allows to stick us on the screen.

3) He wants to be loyal to "Gossip Girl" for long time.

4) He will become exactly like Rufus the best dad of the world.

5) He is the son of a preacher man. And Matthew means: Present of God.

6) Matthew has the most enchanting parents, the most enchanting wife and gets the most enchanting child. And he has the most enchanting fans.

7) He is a small clown.

8) Thanks to Matthew I have discovered "Gossip Girl".

9) Matthew connects the world.

10) He can make the worst films still considerable.

11) Only HE is called DILF

12) Although he is so sexy, he is also a loving husband for Naama and a loving child for his parents.

13) He has a really great voice to sing.

14) Nobody looks hotter in uniform.

15) He showed us what a hero is.

16) He's not too famous, and when we tell someone "I love Matthew Settle" and they say "who knows him?" we just answer "don't care,he is hotter than almost every guy on Hollywood".

17) His lips are just gorgeous,

18) Even when he plays a bad guy, we still love him!!

19) Because he melt in the mouth not in the hands (loool, it's a little insider between Lolo and me)

20) Because he has a big heart for kids

21) Because he doesn't look like 39, he looks always younger

22) in his wonderful eyes you could immediate sunk

23)

Reasons why we love Rufus

1) He is the best and most attractive parent of the series.

2) All the same, how badly Jenny treats him, he loves his daughter, nevertheless.

3) He gives the best advice to his children.

4) A rocker as a father is simply cool.

5) He wishes the best mother for his children - Lily.

6) He has together with Lily the nicest and also sadest love scenes of the series.

7) He wanted to give Alison a second chance.

8) He has never stopped loving Lily.

9) He has even with Blair or Vanessa an incredibly erotic energy.

10) He can be very witty.

11) He helped Lily always and would never control her life.

12) He looks so sexy with guitar.

13) We missed him if he had less screentime.

14) He has not so much money - but endless LOVE!

15) He is like the best friend for Dan.

16) Because he waited for Jenny to come to him

17)Because we could take Rufus in our arms, if he cries.

18) Because Lily wishes the magical three words from him.

19) Because he could be also the best "dad" for Chuck, if this boy only wants this.

20)
